column7: Included graph for pledge amount prediction with three different forecast models. The data for this graph is located in the tab 'Forecast Calculations' - Ser Erris

Ser Erris: Forecast models: ALT1 is the average over quartile 1 and 2, ALT2 is the average over trimmean 10%. Last update for forecast is 05/03/2013
-changed calulation period for forecast (02/17/13 - today) to get a better prediction.
-changed calculations in the background to make less expensive in calculation CPU requirements.
-changed the linear regression starting of 01/01/2015. Will give a good picture if we make some of those jumps every few month
Added linear regression for the last 30 days and forecasting it. This is a good assumption on where we end up, if we continue as we did lately. Basically it is like putting a ruler on the Reality graph and draw a line. Again, taking 2015 values into account only.

Stpehen Dumbeck (Oct 9th 2016) - Updated the forcast to go to 2018. Updated pledge development, funding by month, and several other graphs.

column6: Dogfighting Livestream. Cutlass and updated Avenger added to Hangar. Cutlass game package, Redacted Hoodies, and gift cards added to store
Large number of new Star Citizens in the past few days since Christmas Eve. This is causing the average pledge per citizen to go down rapidly. Great to see growth.
Youtuber "FRANKIEonPCin1080p" posted a video of Star Citizen shortly after 20:00. This seems to have corisponded with a noticibly increased pledge rate.

column7: 3rd Anniversary Sale plus Livestream.  Sale continues through November 30th.
Issues with global payment processing caused the funding tracker to malfunction.  At approximately 21:00 UTC+1 funding tracker reset to ~$98.17 million.
Due to payment processing malfunction on November 28th, 3rd Anniversary Sale extended to December 1st at 18:00 UTC+1.
